description: A 16-year-old boy is found dead after being shot in south London on Tuesday afternoon.
title: Stockwell Tube: Teenage boy shot dead near station
title_page: Stockwell Tube: Teenage boy shot dead near station - BBC News
maintext:
A 16-year-old boy has died after being shot in an "enormously shocking incident" in south London, the Metropolitan Police has said.
The teenager was pronounced dead at the scene in Paradise Road near Stockwell Tube station, after police were called at about 14:30 GMT on Tuesday to reports of a shooting.
Officers are working to identify the victim and contact his family. No arrests have been made.
Supt Gabriel Cameron said: "Our thoughts are with the young boy's family at this devastating time."
